name: Project Ichtys Demo
description:
Hello!

This is a project me and Lowlel have been working on for the past year or so. It was supposed to be a first project I'd fully finish, but that didn't really pan out.

This demo still serves to showcase what assets and art style the project had going for it, which I believe is still worth sharing.


CONTROLS:

ESCAPE - pause
W, A, S, D - move
SPACEBAR - dash
LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - attack
RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON - shoot
SHIFT - hammer (check the pause menu)


CREDITS:
Lowlel - Responsible for the music and sound effects within the game

Babu - Responsible for designing the main character

Patera Bach - Responsible for coding, art, and gameplay

I'm not sure whether I'll continue making games after this, I am quite burned out and don't believe I have the necessary skills to make a full game.
